entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 1:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
